edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal
Class CmtElGamalWithProofsReceiver

java.lang.Object
  edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal.CmtElGamalReceiverCore
      edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal.CmtElGamalOnGroupElementReceiver
          edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal.CmtElGamalWithProofsReceiver
All Implemented Interfaces:
CmtOnGroupElement, CmtReceiver, CmtWithProofsReceiver, CommitSecLevel, PerfectlyBindingCmt, SecureCommit, SecurityLevel
public class CmtElGamalWithProofsReceiver
extends CmtElGamalOnGroupElementReceiver
implements CmtWithProofsReceiver

Concrete implementation of receiver with proofs. This implementation uses ZK based on SigmaElGamalKnowledge and SIgmaElGamalCommittedValue.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
